property.name: Tooltip
property.tooltip: A tooltip text for this widget

property.name: Accelerators
property.tooltip: A list of accelerator keys

property.name: Accessible Name
property.tooltip: Object instance's name formatted for assistive technology access

property.name: Accessible Description
property.tooltip: Description of an object, formatted for assistive technology access

property.name: Controlled By
property.tooltip: Indicates an object controlled by one or more target objects

property.name: Controller For
property.tooltip: Indicates an object is a controller for one or more target objects

property.name: Labelled By
property.tooltip: Indicates an object is labelled by one or more target objects

property.name: Label For
property.tooltip: Indicates an object is a label for one or more target objects

property.name: Member Of
property.tooltip: Indicates an object is a member of a group of one or more target objects

property.name: Node Child Of
property.tooltip: Indicates an object is a cell in a treetable which is displayed because a cell in the same column is expanded and identifies that cell

property.name: Flows To
property.tooltip: Indicates that the object has content that flows logically to another AtkObject in a sequential way, (for instance text-flow)

property.name: Flows From
property.tooltip: Indicates that the object has content that flows logically from another AtkObject in a sequential way, (for instance text-flow)

property.name: Subwindow Of
property.tooltip: Indicates a subwindow attached to a component but otherwise has no connection in the UI hierarchy to that component

property.name: Embeds
property.tooltip: Indicates that the object visually embeds another object's content, i.e. this object's content flows around another's content

property.name: Embedded By
property.tooltip: Inverse of 'Embeds', indicates that this object's content is visually embedded in another object

property.name: Popup For
property.tooltip: Indicates that an object is a popup for another object

property.name: Parent Window Of
property.tooltip: Indicates that an object is a parent window of another object

property.name: Described By
property.tooltip: Indicates that another object provides descriptive information about this object; more verbose than 'Labelled By'

property.name: Description For
property.tooltip: Indicates that an object provides descriptive information about another object; more verbose than 'Label For'

property.name: Number of items
property.tooltip: The number of items in the box

property.name: Position
property.tooltip: The position of the menu item in the menu shell

property.name: Click
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Click atk action

property.name: Stock Item
property.tooltip: The stock item for this menu item

property.name: Position
property.tooltip: The position of the tool item in the toolbar

property.name: Position
property.tooltip: The position of the tool item group in the palette
The stock icon displayed on the item (choose an item from GTK+ stock or from an icon factory)

property.name: Icon
property.tooltip: A file name, full or relative path to load an icon for this toolbutton

property.name: Attributes
property.tooltip: The pango attributes for this label

property.name: Activate
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Activate atk action

property.name: Text
property.tooltip: Set the text in the view's text buffer

property.name: Stock Button
property.tooltip: The stock item for this button

property.name: Response ID
property.tooltip: The response ID of this button in a dialog

property.name: Click
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Click atk action

property.name: Press
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Press atk action

property.name: Release
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Release atk action

property.name: Items
property.tooltip: The items in this combo box

property.name: Press
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Press atk action

property.name: Icon Size
property.tooltip: A symbolic icon size for the stock icon
Set the current page (strictly for editing purposes)

property.name: Number of pages
property.tooltip: The number of pages in the notebook

property.name: Activate
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Activate atk action
You can mark this as translatable and set one name/address if you want to show a translation specific translator, otherwise you should list all translators and unmark this string for translation

property.name: Press
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Press atk action

property.name: Press
property.tooltip: Set the description of the Press atk action

property.name: Label
property.tooltip: The text to display

property.name: Number of Pages
property.tooltip: Number of pages in this assistant

property.name: Initially Complete
property.tooltip: Whether this page will initially be marked as complete regardless of user input.

property.name: Position
property.tooltip: The page position in the Assistant

property.name: Widgets
property.tooltip: List of widgets in this group

property.tooltip: An accelerator key for this action

property.name: Icon Sources
property.tooltip: A list of sources for this icon factory

property.tooltip: Enter a list of values to be applied on each row
